lines.gurmukhi: bwXs aufh bl jwau byg imlO pIX imtY duK rog sog ibrh ibXog ko
lines.transliteration_english: Baayas Udah Bal Jaau Bayg Milau Peeya , Mitai Doukh Rog Sog Birah Biyog Ko ?

Shabad OS B.translation: I am sacrifice unto you 0 Crow! go and convey my message to my beloved to come and meet me soon so as to allay my sufferings, distresses and pangs of separation;

lines.gurmukhi: AvD ibkt ktY kpt AMqr pt dyKau idn pRym rs shj sMjog ko
lines.transliteration_english: Avadh Bikat Katai Kapat Antar Pata , Daykhau Din Praym Ras Sahaj Sanjog Ko ?

Shabad OS B.translation: O my beloved! separated from you, the life has become hard to spend. I am living in ignorance. Then how will I ever get the opportunity of uniting with my husband Lord to relish His love for ever?

lines.gurmukhi: lwl n Awvq suB lgn sgn Bly hoie n iblMb kCu Byd byd lok ko
lines.transliteration_english: Laal N Aavat Soubh Lagan Sagan Bhalay , Hoi N Bilanb Kachhu Bhayd Bayd Lok Ko ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Time and omen appear auspicious, yet the dear beloved is not coming. Hopefully the cause of the delay in His arrival is not my worldly attachments.

lines.gurmukhi: Aiqih Awqur BeI AiDk AOsyr lwgI DIrj n DrO KojO Dwir ByK jog ko ]571]
lines.transliteration_english: Atihi Aatur Bhaee Adhik Aousayr Laagee , Dheeraj N Dharau Khojau Dhaari Bhaykh Jog Ko ?571?

Shabad OS B.translation: O my dear beloved! much delay has taken place in meeting with You and I am very anxious and impatient to meet You. I can hold on to my patience no more. Should I then dress up as a (female) yogi and search You?  (571)
